thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: France's AccorHotels in talks to buy Movenpick -Le Figaro

author: Reuters Editorial
title: France's AccorHotels in talks to buy Movenpick -Le Figaro
text:
PARIS, April 25 (Reuters) - French hotel group AccorHotels is in talks to buy hotel chain Movenpick Hotels & Resorts, Le Figaro newspaper reported in its Thursday edition.
The paper did not provide any further details.
A spokeswoman for Accor declined to comment.
Movenpick, which manages 20,000-plus rooms in more than 83 hotels across Africa, Asia, Europe and the Middle East, could not be reached for comment.
AccorHotels, Europeâ€™s biggest hotel group, said last week it will make further acquisitions in coming years using cash from the sale of a majority stake in its property business rather than pay a special dividend. (Reporting by Bate Felix and Gilles Guillaume; Editing by Adrian Croft)
